main: ^Do you want to recap the info about Mines View Park?

c-0: ^Alright! Mines View Park originally overlooks the now abandoned gold and copper mine. A ridge located at the extreme northeast side of the city where you can see the northern outskirts of Baguio City.
^If you want to recap the info about it. Don't forget to let me know!

c-1: ^Okay! Just approach me if you want to know the info about it.
